creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council
description: decorated with brown transfers picturing nursery rhymes including, 'HEY DIDDLE DIDDLE; THE CAT AND THE FIDDLE; OLD MOTHER HUBBARD WENT TO THE CUPBOARD; THE FARMERS WIFE JUMPED OUT OF BED'; plates include, 'HEY DIDDLE DIDDLE; THE CAT AND THE FIDDLE; THE COW JUMPED OVER THE MOON; THE LITTLE DOG LAUGHED TO SEE SUCH CRAFT AND THE DISH RAN AWAY WITH THE SPOON'; saucers include, 'THERE WAS A LITTLE MAN AND HE HAD A LITTLE GUN AND HIS BULLETS WERE MADE OF LEAD, LEAD, LEAD'
markings: \'R° N° 103739\', bottom of all pieces; \'W & Cº Nursery Rhymes Hanley\', bottom of all pieces except cups and creamer
title: Nursery Rhyme Tea Set
